name: Aquaworld 2
description:
Explore, craft, and fight your way through the depths of an underwater world. Face the horrors of the deep while you search for the last seeds of the Old World, and of humanity. And don't forget your trusty sidekick, pile of bones!

Note: This game does not run in Sandboxie, but it works great the way it was intended to be played. You can trust us!

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Left mouse button - Melee Attack / Use Equipped Weapon/ Consume Item in Inventory / Equip item

C - Open Crafting Menu

Tab / I - Open Inventory

1-4 - Select Hotbar Item

Escape / P - Pause Menu

Gamepad (Xbox Template):

Left Stick - Movement

Right Stick - Aim

A - Jump/Select/Consume Item in Inventory

Right Bumper - Use Equipped Item

Y - Open Crafting Menu

Select - Open Inventory

D-Pad - Select Hotbar Item

Start - Pause Menu

Credits Joey Cox aka (uncle_specter)
